message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I think we can come to an agreement that's fair for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can meet at a price that's more in my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $12,000 just isn't feasible for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000. That's a fair compromise that still gives me some wiggle room. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can meet at a price that's more in my budget.
